LearnSpell.chatFlavorTeacherTest: {name} tries to lern the {spell} spell, with the help of a mentor. Spellcasting of the Mentor:
LearnSpell.legendPatterncraft: Patterncraft options to learn the spell
LearnSpell.noPatterncraftTalentFound: No fitting Patterncraft talent found (see ed-ids)
LearnSpell.noSpellcastingTalentFound: No fitting Spellcasting talent found (see ed-ids)

Rules.disciplineLearnShortRequirements:
• study with an adept of the desired discipline (5th circle or higher)
  • standard fee is 100 silver pieces for each circle the student has achieved in other disciplines, charged for each talent the adept needs to learn
  • learn all of the first circle discipline talents you do not yet know at rank 1
  • must have enough current legend points to pay for these new talents simultaneously
  • use the lowest circle among current disciplines to determine the legend point cost for a rank 1 talent in the new discipline
  • talent option for first circle can be learned at a later time, all talent option slots for the new discipline must be chosen from that discipline
  • for each new talent study with the tutor for 40 hours during the course of a week
Rules.questorClassIncreaseShortRequirements:
• Commune with the Passion by using the Questor Devotion
  • no Test required
  • Only one Devotion can be learned or increased per day, and no more than one rank can be increased at a time
  • There are no limitations to increasing the rank of the Questor Devotion within the same category, other than the legend point cost and the time required for the Devotion
  • Change from one category to another (e. g. from follower to adherent) requires taking on and fulfilling a Quest in the name of the Passion
  • A devotion can also be learned from a precious tier
  • Legend point cost for increasing a devotion is based on when it becomes available, even if it is learned later
